name: test-domain-cloudpanel
afterHooks: cd /home/testdigispace/htdocs/t-digi-space.inf.ua/current &&  composer install --no-dev --no-interaction --prefer-dist &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan migrate &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan config:cache &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan route:cache

name: main-domain-cloudpanel
afterHooks: cd /home/digispace-main/htdocs/digispace.pro/current &&  composer install --no-dev --no-interaction --prefer-dist &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan migrate &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan config:cache &&  /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan route:cache
